deliberate.translation[0].definitions[0]: a deliberate attempt to humiliate her
The attack on him was quite deliberate.
deliberate.translation[0].definitions[1]: deliberate speech, thought, or movement is slow and careful
He approached her with slow, deliberate steps.
deliberate.translation[1].definitions[0]: to think about something very carefully
The jury deliberated for four days before acquitting him.
There was silence while she deliberated on his words.
